thread.title: Cinergy Entertainment Names Darek Heath as New Chief Operating Officer

author: cnbc.com
title: Cinergy Entertainment Names Darek Heath as New Chief Operating Officer
text:
DALLAS, Feb. 15, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Cinergy Entertainment Group announced today the appointment of Darek Heath as the new Chief Operating Officer. Darek Heath started at Cinergy Entertainment as the Vice President of Operations, tackling a large-scale project to revamp Cinergy's culture and core values with a targeted and clear vision. He assumes his new role as Chief Operating Officer as Cinergy plans to open two new locations this year in addition to expansion projects slated for 2019 and beyond. He brings his extensive background in operations to execute an effective strategy that accommodates Cinergy's expansion.
"Cinergy is pleased to promote Darek Heath to this new role. He brings close to two decades worth of experience in the Cinema dining industry. His dynamic energy and enthusiasm will continue to inspire those in the field and at the home office," stated Jeff Benson, Founder and CEO of Cinergy Entertainment Group.
Darek Heath spent 13 years at Studio Movie Grill, where he gained field experience as a General Manager and quickly worked to become the Director of Operations. Additionally, he served as Vice President of Operations and Vice President of Development from 2006 to 2012 before becoming Vice President of Training and Recruiting in January 2013. Before concluding his chapter with Studio Movie Grill in 2015, Darek successfully developed and launched the Studio Movie Grill University, which focused on teaching managers at all levels leadership and management development. He joined Dickey's Barbecue as Vice President of Training, quickly becoming the Vice President of Operations. He joined Cinergy Entertainment Group in August 2016 as the Vice President of Operations. Cinergy Entertainment is excited for his new appointment as the Chief Operating Officer and looks forward to an exciting new year.
About Cinergy Entertainment
Dallas, Texas-based Cinergy Entertainment Group, Inc. is a visionary industry innovator and regional operator of three Texas cinema entertainment centers with 29 screens and 18 lanes of bowling. The company has four additional locations under development representing 38 screens and 71 lanes of bowling. All Cinergy centers feature dine-in cinemas serving alcoholic beverages and a tempting array of restaurant quality food and beverages. In addition to upscale cinema amenities, all Cinergy locations feature a unique selection of interactive games and a variety of other amenities, including bowling, billiards, full bars, laser tag, and Sky Walker ropes course. Cinergy is privately held by the Benson family. For more information, visit Cinergy at www.Cinergy.com .
